text: Ronald Michael Green is an American theologian, currently Eunice and Julian Cohen Professor Emeritus for the Study of Ethics and Human Values Professor at Dartmouth College. Green graduated from Brown University before his Ph.D. in Religious Ethics at Harvard University. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Dartmouth College faculty Category:American theologians Category:Brown University alumni Category:Harvard University alumni
title: Ronald Michael Green
